title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.7 - Requests for public access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.7 - Requests for public access to records

State Regulations
(a) All requests for public access to records
of the fund shall be made in accordance with the provisions of this Part; provided, however, that the general manager or his duly designated
representative may waive compliance with any formality prescribed by this

Part. (b) Requests for public access
to records of the fund shall be sufficiently detailed so that the records can
be identified. Where possible, the applicant shall supply information regarding
dates, titles, file designations or other information that may help identify
the records. (c) A request for any
or all records falling within a specific category shall conform to the standard
that records be identifiable. (d) The records access officer shall assist the applicant in identifying requested
records, if necessary. Notes

1550.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
